awd_titl_txt: An Automated Environment for Engineering Software           Development
awd_abstract_narration: A prototype domain-specific software                                            environment will be developed will                                              be developed using structural                                                   engineering domain as a test case.                                              This environment will be centered                                               around the concept of software reuse                                            and will be composed of Computer                                                Aided Software Engineering (CASE)                                               tools for managing and integrating                                              reusable software components into                                               applications.  The goal is to create                                            an environment by enhancing and                                                 tailoring general-purpose software                                              development to a specific class of                                              applications, and to demonstrate its                                            potential for improvement of quality                                            and productivity in research and                                                instructional software.
org_div_long_name: Division of Electrical, Communications and Cyber Systems
